remarks: Generalize ~ lebnum to extended metrics.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2015.)
statement:
xlebnum.j $e |- J = ( MetOpen ` D ) $.
xlebnum.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) $.
xlebnum.c $e |- ( ph -> J e. Comp ) $.
xlebnum.s $e |- ( ph -> U C_ J ) $.
xlebnum.u $e |- ( ph -> X = U. U ) $.
xlebnum $p |- ( ph -> E. d e. RR+ A. x e. X E. u e. U ( x ( ball ` D ) d ) C_ u ) $.
$d D d u x $.
$d U d u x $.
$d X d u x $.
$d ph u x $.
